title: Ale Delivery
description: Deliver a keg of ale from the innkeeper to the blacksmith.

fetch.description: Deliver Special Ale to Merchant Karl

questText: I have a special ale order that needs to be delivered to Merchant Karl at the market square. He's been waiting for this particular brew. Could you take it to him? I'll give you something for your trouble.
completionText: Thank you so much! Karl has been asking about that ale for weeks. Here's your payment, and take this healing potion as a bonus!
